Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! Thought I'd say hello and everything. Been using this forum for info for a long time now, so I thought I'd join up.

Im having issues giving my spaceplane lift without too much of a payload. Currently it is rising about 1.5 m/s. I plan on docking this with my space station and going to minmus and/ or the mun and back! Thanks in advance!

Also, how do I change my avatar?

Also, how do I attach images? I'm on an android phone.

Welcome to the forums Mike

You can change your avatar after your third post, just in case you're a spambot or you frequent shock sites, it happens...

Images can be uploaded to imgur.com and the url posted here.

There's a load of people who'd be willing to help with your plane, take pics in KSP with F1 for us
Awesome thanks! Does this mean I have to make an image err account? Cause I'm sort of not down. I wish I could just snap a photo with my phone

Okay I guess I don't need to make an account haha. Here are 4 photos.

I call it Trycho-K930. It has 28 vertical control surfaces, 6 lateral control surfaces, 4 Rockomax 55s for ascent out of atmosphere, and 2 D-30F7 turbojets as main engines. As you can see there is a docking port equipped with lights in case of night docks. There are 8 DSI inlets as well.

Thanks again.

http://imgur.com/vP67sKV

http://imgur.com/O98U8H7

http://imgur.com/STdawOP

http://imgur.com/TpU8uQn
hrm i would think you have too many rocket engines and not enough Turbojets... also the F1 button will take screenshots in game (and at a higher quality than your phone)
